node.display_long_description:
A portal to new worlds, a virtual home filled with endless experiences to discover and explore, a place to connect with loved ones. World travel, casual games, media customization,  adventure, and relaxation.

- Invite your friends and family, and travel together to new places to see the world - hundreds of virtual travels to all continents: take a city tour, a hot air balloon ride, a back-country road trip
- Explore the depth of the ocean - go diving in the Great Barrier Reef of Australia, or swim with dolphins in the Pacific Ocean
- Relax and practice meditation in nature - guided, or unguided
- Listen to classical music
- Play with your virtual pet
- Play games, share photos, upload and watch your own videos - standard, and 360, and step into them together.

Alcove has something for everyone, no matter your age. Download Alcove and start exploring today!

Note: Alcove will keep growing with new immersive experiences and features. Please let us know what you’d love to see next.

node.display_short_description: Take off into space with 2 gravity-defying expeditions, 14 and 11 minutes each. These award-winning short VR films from Faber Courtial took the world by storm at Cannes XR, Venice Film Festival, Tribeca and many more, by conveying how it must feel to actually be out in the open cosmos. Visit unknown worlds of extraordinary richness, detail and authenticity - perfectly reconstructed in 3D from original NASA and ESA data.

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (Alcove) 才能玩

nodes.title: NEW Jigsaw360 puzzles in Alcove!
nodes.body_text:
Assemble spherical and flat jigsaw puzzles of Earth and Alcove Rooms with Jigsaw360 available now at the Interactives Table in Alcove.

Enhance your mood. Improve spatial reasoning and problem solving. Relax. In Jigsaw 360 you'll never lose a puzzle piece again!

We're excited to bring you these puzzles with more on the way. Let us know which ones you like, and what puzzles you'd like to see next. We're always available at feedback@alcovevr.com.

nodes.title: 10 NEW 3D tours of Malta! Over 2 hours of sightseeing on the Mediterranean Island.
nodes.body_text:
Escape to Malta's ancient cities, sun-soaked beaches, landmarks, parks and cafes in Alcove's newest destination to explore, on your own or with up to three friends.

Choose from ten guided and non-guided tours to Valletta, the 16th century Renaissance capital city and UNESCO World Heritage Site, take a boat tour, and much more - for over two hours of immersive travel, all filmed in 3D.

We hope that you enjoy Malta and all of Alcove's destinations, games and activities. Let us know your favorite part of the tour and where you'd like to travel next! Email us at any time with your recommendations and questions at feedback@alcovevr.com

Bon Voyage!

node.reviewDescription:
I love being inside this house, especially now that I've worked out how to add my own photos to the walls. I agree with some of the other reviews, that more sound effects would be great for the scenery and the fire. Maybe also have it tied to the time zone so that when I put it on at night it's dark outside?

What I would really love is a game like this where I can actually design and build my own dream house and walk around inside it. Maybe something that has lots of rooms and modules you can select and adapt to build your own place. But really, I would live in the Alcove house if I could.

developerResponse.body: Hi Retroramblings, we're glad you love the house and are enjoying your photo gallery! Thanks so much for your kind review and sharing your ideas for a future release. We're always adding new features and content so this helps us zero in on the areas we where we can expand. In the meantime, we hope you enjoy our latest addition of 10 NEW 3D tours of Malta in the Travel Room - over two hours of sightseeing on the Mediterranean island, and new jigsaw puzzles at the Interactives table. You can always reach us at feedback@alcovevr.com. Happy exploring!  - Team Alcove
